description:
>nova-manage vpn list project_name
...
Command failed, please check log for more info

2011-09-13 13:17:52,473 nova: Mapper 'Mapper|Instance|instances' has no property 'fixed_ip'
(nova): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/bin/nova-manage", line 1527, in <module>
(nova): TRACE:     main()

(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/bin/nova-manage", line 181, in list
(nova): TRACE:     nwzzz=db.instance_get_project_vpn(ctxt, project.id)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/db/api.py", line 547, in instance_get_project_vpn
(nova): TRACE:     return IMPL.instance_get_project_vpn(context, project_id)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.py", line 97, in wrapper
(nova): TRACE:     return f(*args, **kwargs)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.py", line 1279, in instance_get_project_vpn
(nova): TRACE:     options(joinedload_all('fixed_ip.network')).\
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages/sqlalchemy/orm/query.py", line 786, in options
(nova): TRACE:     return self._options(False, *args)
(nova): TRACE:   File "<string>", line 1, in <lambda>
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages/sqlalchemy/orm/query.py", line 52, in generate
(nova): TRACE:     fn(self, *args[1:], **kw)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages/sqlalchemy/orm/query.py", line 803, in _options
(nova): TRACE:     opt.process_query(self)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages/sqlalchemy/orm/interfaces.py", line 779, in process_query
(nova): TRACE:     self._process(query, True)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages/sqlalchemy/orm/interfaces.py", line 785, in _process
(nova): TRACE:     paths, mappers = self._get_paths(query, raiseerr)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages/sqlalchemy/orm/interfaces.py", line 862, in _get_paths
(nova): TRACE:     resolve_synonyms=True, raiseerr=raiseerr)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages/sqlalchemy/orm/mapper.py", line 931, in get_property
(nova): TRACE:     "Mapper '%s' has no property '%s'" % (self, key))
(nova): TRACE: InvalidRequestError: Mapper 'Mapper|Instance|instances' has no property 'fixed_ip'
(nova): TRACE:
title: command 'nova-manage vpn list progect_name' faild

comments.content:
>nova-manage vpn list project_name
...
Command failed, please check log for more info

2011-09-13 13:17:52,473 nova: Mapper 'Mapper|Instance|instances' has no property 'fixed_ip'
(nova): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/bin/nova-manage", line 1527, in <module>
(nova): TRACE:     main()
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/bin/nova-manage", line 1515, in main
(nova): TRACE:     fn(*fn_args, **fn_kwargs)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/bin/nova-manage", line 181, in list
(nova): TRACE:     nwzzz=db.instance_get_project_vpn(ctxt, project.id)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/db/api.py", line 547, in instance_get_project_vpn
(nova): TRACE:     return IMPL.instance_get_project_vpn(context, project_id)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.py", line 97, in wrapper
(nova): TRACE:     return f(*args, **kwargs)
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/nova/db/sqlalchemy/api.py", line 1279, in instance_get_project_vpn
(nova): TRACE:     options(joinedload_all('fixed_ip.network')).\
(nova): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib64/python2.6/site-packages/sqlalchemy/orm/query.py", line 786, in options

comments.content: The code causing this problem was fixed on the 1-Jul-2011, https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/3a65ea2f29ca169779cbd09acf4f7ac50314c969
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~adriansmith

comments.content: Marking fixed per previous comment -- please reopen if you disagree.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
